scripts.copy-all: npm run copy-plugin && npm run copy-redrunner && npm run copy-router
scripts.copy-redrunner: npm run copy-redrunner-src && npm run copy-redrunner-dist
scripts.copy-router: npm run copy-router-src && npm run copy-router-dist
scripts.rebuild: npm run rebuild-redrunner && npm run rebuild-router && npm run rebuild-plugin
scripts.rebuild-redrunner: cd ../packages/redrunner && npm run build && cd - && npm run copy-redrunner
scripts.rebuild-router: cd ../packages/redrunner-router && npm run build && cd - && npm run copy-router
